com.isbx.locationtools.components

Class PlacesComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isbx.androidtools.utils.ActivityLifecycleListener
      • com.isbx.locationtools.components.PlacesComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks

    public class PlacesComponent
extends ActivityLifecycleListener
implements com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks
    A convenience class for interacting with the Google Places API.

    This class handles the necessary GoogleApiClient connection link internally to reduce the need for boilerplate code, and provides a simple interface for retrieving Places and performing autocomplete requests: 

     PlacesComponent placesComponent = new PlacesComponent(this);
 placesComponent.getAutoCompletePredictions(query, latLngBounds, new AutocompleteCallback() {
     @Override
     public void onAutocompletePredictionsReceived(List<AutocompletePrediction> autocompletePredictionList) {
         // Handle autcomplete results
     }
 });

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PlacesComponent.AutocompleteCallback
      Callback interface to receive AutocompletePredictions from asynchronous operations.
      static interface  PlacesComponent.PlaceCallback
      Callback interface to receive Place objects from asynchronous operations.
      class  PlacesComponent.RetrieveAutocompletePredictionsTask
      Implementation of AsyncTask that performs autocomplete lookups for the given query strings within a geographic area defined by the LatLngBounds passed into its constructor.

      • getAutoCompletePredictions

        public void getAutoCompletePredictions(String query,
                                       com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds bounds,
                                       PlacesComponent.AutocompleteCallback callback)
        Performs an asynchronous request to find autocomplete results for the given query string. The request will attempt to limit results to those that lie within bounds. The results will be passed to callback, or null if the request fails.
        Parameters:
        query - The query string to get autocomplete results for
        bounds - A LatLngBounds object to use to restrict the results set
        callback - A PlacesComponent.AutocompleteCallback that will receive the AutocompletePrediction results of the request, or null if the request fails

      • getPlaceById

        public void getPlaceById(String placeId,
                         PlacesComponent.PlaceCallback callback)
        Performs an asynchronous request to retrieve a Place by its given id.
        Parameters:
        placeId - The id of the place to retrieve
        callback - A PlacesComponent.PlaceCallback to be notified with the resulting Place
        See Also:
        GeoDataApi.getPlaceById(GoogleApiClient, String...)
